# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="ec1ae-102">Přidání e-mailových zpráv emojis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ec1ae-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ec1ae-103">Do zprávy můžete vložit emojis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ec1ae-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="ec1ae-104">Odpověď na existující e-mail nebo vyberte **novou zprávu**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ec1ae-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="ec1ae-105">Klepněte na tlačítko **Vložit emojis**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ec1ae-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="ec1ae-106">dole v okně pro psaní výrazy podokno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ec1ae-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="ec1ae-107">Vyhledejte a vyberte emoji nebo GIF, který chcete vložit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ec1ae-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
